author: husted
msg: Submitted by Ted Husted. package.html for template taglib ("Developers Guide").

author: husted
msg: Refactor template example HTML and JSP, add link to David Geary's source article, and
Add welcome page property to web.xml
<!-- The Welcome File List -->
<welcome-file-list>
<welcome-file>introduction.jsp</welcome-file>
</welcome-file-list>
Add documentation blocks to bottoms of key JSPs
[introduction.jsp]
Specify template for this page (chapterTemplate.jsp).
The chapterTemplate.jsp defines the layout positoins for five
elements: title, header, sidebar, content, and footer.
Specify the source file (html or jsp) for each element.
[chapterTemplate.jsp]
Define the layout positions for the logical elements of this
page design: title, sidebar, header, content, and footer.
The actual source files for each logical element must be
specified by a JSP implementing this template.

author: husted
msg: Submitted by Ted Husted. Add missing at line 400.
• notPresent the companion tag to
present, notPresent provides the same functionality when the specified attribute
is not present.
